不怕慢，只怕站: Fear not the slowness, only the stoppage. - Chinese Proverb
失敗は成功のもと: Failure is the foundation of success. - Japanese Proverb
행운은 용기 있는 자에게만 온다: Luck comes only to those who dare. - Korean Proverb
Chi semina vento raccoglie tempesta: Those who sow the wind reap the whirlwind. - Italian Proverb
La vida es sueño, y los sueños, sueños s: Life is a dream, and dreams are but dreams. - Spanish Proverb
Vivre le moment présent: Live in the present moment. - French Proverb
Att tro på sig själv är början till all: Believing in oneself is the beginning of success. - Swedish Proverb
Non ducor duco: I am not led; I lead. - Latin Phrase
七転び八起き: Fall seven times, stand up eight. - Japanese Proverb
무조건이 승리다: No surrender, no defeat. - Korean Proverb
Una rondine non fa primavera: One swallow does not make a summer. - Italian Proverb
Der Apfel fällt nicht weit vom Stamm: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree. - German Proverb
Qui n'avance pas, recule: He who doesn't move forward, goes backward. - French Proverb
En plats i solen: A place in the sun. - Swedish Proverb
自助者天助: God helps those who help themselves. - Chinese Proverb
石の上にも三年: Sitting on a rock for three years. - Japanese Proverb
세상은 넓고 배우는 길은 멀다: The world is vast, and the path of learning is long. - Korean Proverb
A tutto c'è rimedio fuorché alla morte: Everything has a remedy except death. - Italian Proverb
Dime con quién andas, y te diré quién er: Tell me who you walk with, and I'll tell you who you are. - Spanish Proverb
Der Klügere gibt nach: The wiser one gives in. - German Proverb
C'est l'exception qui confirme la règle: It's the exception that proves the rule. - French Proverb
Bättre sent än aldrig: Better late than never. - Swedish Proverb
Vivere est cogitare: To live is to think. - Latin Phrase
良薬は口に苦し: Good medicine tastes bitter. - Japanese Proverb
노력은 배신하지 않는다: Efforts will never betray you. - Korean Proverb
Ogni cosa ha la sua bellezza, ma non tut: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone sees it. - Italian Proverb
A quien madruga, Dios le ayuda: God helps those who get up early. - Spanish Proverb
Lachen ist die beste Medizin: Laughter is the best medicine. - German Proverb
À quelque chose malheur est bon: Every cloud has a silver lining. - French Proverb
Borta bra men hemma bäst: Away is good, but home is best. - Swedish Proverb
Aut viam inveniam aut faciam: I will find a way or make one. - Latin Phrase
万事開花結果: All things bloom and bear fruit. - Chinese Proverb
頭隠して尻隠さず: Hiding one's head but not hiding one's bottom. - Japanese Proverb
재수 없는 것은 재수 없다: If luck isn't with you, it just isn't. - Korean Proverb
Cane scottato teme l'acqua fredda: A scalded dog fears cold water. - Italian Proverb
Quien siembra vientos recoge tempestades: He who sows winds reaps storms. - Spanish Proverb
Hunde, die bellen, beißen nicht: Barking dogs seldom bite. - German Proverb
Chacun voit midi à sa porte: Everyone sees noon at his doorstep. - French Proverb
Aequam memento rebus in arduis servare m: Remember to keep a calm mind in difficult situations. - Latin Phrase
鐘が鳴るなり人が逝く: When the bell tolls, someone departs. - Japanese Proverb
시작이 반이다: Starting is half the task. - Korean Proverb
Aiutati che Dio t'aiuta: Help yourself, and God will help you. - Italian Proverb
Las desgracias nunca vienen solas: Misfortunes never come alone. - Spanish Proverb
Ein Bild sagt mehr als tausend Worte: A picture is worth a thousand words. - German Proverb
C'est en forgeant qu'on devient forgeron: It is by forging that one becomes a blacksmith. - French Proverb
Det är inte skammen att be om hjälp, men: It's not shameful to ask for help, but not doing so is. - Swedish Proverb
